content:
# The Stone Furnace now has 11 Copper Plates produced, and it is currently operational with 13 units of Coal available. 
# However, it still indicates "NO INGREDIENTS TO SMELT," which means it has no Copper Ore left to process.

# Since I have already harvested Copper Ore earlier, I need to insert the remaining 2 units of Copper Ore into the furnace to continue smelting and produce more Copper Plates.

insert_item(Prototype.CopperOre, target=stone_furnace_entity, quantity=2)  # Inserting 2 units of Copper Ore into the furnace.

# After this insertion, I will check the status of the Stone Furnace and my inventory again to confirm the changes.
furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(stone_furnace_entity)  # Inspect the furnace inventory again.
print(f"Stone Furnace Inventory after inserting Copper Ore: {furnace_inventory}")  # Display the contents of the Stone Furnace after insertion.
print(f"Inventory after inserting Copper Ore: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check my inventory after insertion.
